allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize performance: move styles outside component, add CSS file

- Move styles object outside SalahCounter component to prevent recreation on every render
- Create App.css for keyframes animations and button hover states
- Remove duplicate inline style tags from JSX

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
